snippet: Led by the potent backcourt combo of Damian Lillard and C.J. McCollum, the Portland Trail Blazers rebounded from their worst loss of the season by pulling away to beat an ineffective John Wall and the Washington Wizards 108-98 Monday....
lead_paragraph: Led by the potent backcourt combo of Damian Lillard and C.J. McCollum, the Portland Trail Blazers rebounded from their worst loss of the season by pulling away to beat an ineffective John Wall and the Washington Wizards 108-98 Monday.

headline.main: Trail Blazers Rebound From Loss to 76ers by Beating Wizards
headline.print_headline: Trail Blazers Rebound From Loss to 76ers by Beating Wizards
